meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Special Recognition
agenda_items.description: Special recognition of Barbara Sneary for her 27 years of service and dedication to the City of Dallas and Park & Recreation Board. Special recognition of Karl Hartford for his 23 years of service and dedication to the City of Dallas and Park & Recreation Board.

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of minutes from the meeting on August 15, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Reverchon Park – Alcohol Permit
agenda_items.description: Authorize issuing an alcohol permit to Jodi Jordan, to serve alcohol at the Katy 5K event to be held at Reverchon park.

agenda_items.title: Reverchon Park – Alcohol Permit
agenda_items.description: Authorize issuing an alcohol permit to Tanisha Maddox, to serve alcohol at the Leukemia & Lymphoma Society Light the Night event.

agenda_items.title: Norbuck Park – Alcohol Permit
agenda_items.description: Authorize issuing an alcohol permit to Michael Baker, to serve alcohol at the Dallas Running Club Half Marathon event.

agenda_items.title: Flag Pole Hill Park – Alcohol Permit
agenda_items.description: Authorize issuing an alcohol permit to Brad McCutcheon, to serve alcohol at the Dallas Oktoberfest event.

agenda_items.title: Flag Pole Hill Park – Alcohol Permit
agenda_items.description: Authorize issuing an alcohol permit to Marcus Grunewald, to serve alcohol at the BMW of Dallas Fun Run.

agenda_items.title: Prism Center – Alcohol Permit
agenda_items.description: Authorize an alcohol permit to 4Oak Events, to serve alcohol at the Night Market.

agenda_items.title: Flag Pole Hill Park – Public Hearing
agenda_items.description: Authorize a public hearing to be held on October 23, 2024, regarding the proposed use of a portion of parkland.

agenda_items.title: Cotton Bowl – Supplemental Agreement
agenda_items.description: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 2 to the construction manager at risk agreement with JE Dunn-Russell for additional construction services.

agenda_items.title: Dallas Arboretum & Botanical Society – Pricing Model
agenda_items.description: Authorize a variable pricing model and a Credit Card Recovery Fee at the Dallas Arboretum and Botanical Society.

financial_items.description: Estimated Revenue from Leukemia & Lymphoma Society Light the Night event
Estimated Revenue from Dallas Running Club Half Marathon event
Estimated Revenue from Dallas Oktoberfest event
Estimated Revenue from BMW of Dallas Fun Run
Revenue from public hearing on parkland use
Construction services for Cotton Bowl Renovation
